title: User journey reporting event metrics
description: For state transitions, we capture certain metrics along with the dimensions. This schema hold the metrics associated with reporting of state transition

orchestrationEnteredJourneyInstance.title: Entered Journey
orchestrationEnteredJourneyInstance.description: Set to 1 when a journey instance is created

orchestrationExitedJourneyInstance.title: Exited journey
orchestrationExitedJourneyInstance.description: Set to 1 when a journey instance is flagged as ended

orchestrationErrorInJourneyInstance.title: Error in Journey Instance
orchestrationErrorInJourneyInstance.description: Set to 1 when an error is raised in a journey instance

orchestrationErrorInEventProcessing.title: Eroor in step processing
orchestrationErrorInEventProcessing.description: Set to 1 when an error occurs during an event processing, that is during a step processing

orchestrationErrorInActionExecution.title: Error in action execution
orchestrationErrorInActionExecution.description: Set to 1 when an error occurs during an action execution

orchestrationErrorInJumpActionExecution.title: Error in jump action
orchestrationErrorInJumpActionExecution.description: Set to 1 when an error occurs during the jump action execution

orchestrationErrorInEnrichment.title: Error in enrichment
orchestrationErrorInEnrichment.description: Set to 1 when an error occurs during enrichment

orchestrationExecutedEvent.title: Event processed
orchestrationExecutedEvent.description: Set to 1 when an event as triggered a transition in a journey instance

orchestrationExecutedAction.title: Action executed
orchestrationExecutedAction.description: Set to 1 when an action is executed successfully in a journey instance

orchestrationExecutedFlowControl.title: Flow control executed
orchestrationExecutedFlowControl.description: Set to 1 when an action is executed successfully in a journey instance

orchestrationExecutedJumpAction.title: Executed jump action
orchestrationExecutedJumpAction.description: Set to 1 when a jump action is executed successfully in a journey instance

orchestrationExecutedEnrichment.title: Enrichment made successfully
orchestrationExecutedEnrichment.description: Set to 1 when an enrichment is executed successfully in a journey instance

orchestrationJumpToJourney.title: Jump action executed successfully
orchestrationJumpToJourney.description: Set to 1 when a jump to another journey instance is made

orchestrationTimeoutInAction.title: Timeout In Action
orchestrationTimeoutInAction.description: Set to 1 when timeout occurs during execution of an action

orchestrationTimeoutInEvent.title: Timeout in Event
orchestrationTimeoutInEvent.description: Set to 1 when timeout occurs during the processing of an event

orchestrationTimeoutInJourney.title: Timeout In Journey
orchestrationTimeoutInJourney.description: Set to 1 when timeout occurs during the flow of a journey

orchestrationTimeoutInEnrichment.title: Timeout In Enrichment
orchestrationTimeoutInEnrichment.description: Set to 1 when timeout occurs during enrichement
